import { Grid } from '@chakra-ui/react' import React from 'react' import Card from '../../components/Card' import {useQuery } from 'react-query' function Products() { const { isLoading, error, data } = useQuery('repoData', () => fetch('http://localhost:4000/product').then(res => res.json() ) ) if (isLoading) return 'Loading...' if (error) return 'An error has occurred: ' + error.message console.log(data) return (
) } export default Products
